roleset.name: to secure or attach with a knot
roleset.note: KNOT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'knot' based on Brown ULA.frame by Perryn (from knot.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: hold together
example.text: The basic principle, the first in a richly knotted bundle, was conveyed tome by Dr. Henry Lee Smith, Jr., where he heads the world's first departmentof anthropology and linguistics.
